urls.title: Black Adam | Official Movie Hub
urls.description: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the ancient gods—and imprisoned just as quickly—Black Adam (Johnson) is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.

urls.title: How Netflix’s “Mo” Evades the Usual Representation Traps
urls.description: A lesser show might have tried to make the titular character a bit more likable, or, perhaps, implanted within him a desire to explain his culture to the rest of the world.

tweets.text:
“Today’s minority creators can sometimes confuse melancholia for nuance, neuroses for insight, and moody low-light camera tricks for art. It is genuinely refreshing to see a protagonist who resists sympathy or identification.”—@jaycaspiankang https://t.co/8sEsGkUupJ 

@realmoamer

I moderated today’s global press conference for #BlackAdam So fun, so nerve-wracking haha. It’s my 1st time for something this huge & it’s live w/ international journalists all over the world participating virtually. Thanks to the cast headed by @TheRock! ❤️ https://t.co/g0Iz8tBmwj

urls.title: ‘Ramy’ and ‘Mo’: How to Be Young, Reckless and Muslim in America
urls.description: One is a portrait of a spiritually conflicted guy in New Jersey, the other follows a Houston-based hustler with the immigration-status blues. Both shows share the same DNA—and deserve your attention.

urls.title: New Netflix series ‘Mo’ is based on Palestinian comic's life as a refugee in Houston
urls.description: The new Netflix comedy "Mo" is gaining acclaim for its portrayal of Arab American life rarely presented in popular culture. Mo Amer, the comedian who wrote and stars in the show, based it on his own story as a refugee in Houston. Jeffrey Brown talked to him for our arts and culture series, "CANVAS."

tweets.text:
The Netflix comedy "Mo" is gaining acclaim for its portrayal of Arab American life rarely presented in popular culture. @realMoAmer talked with @JeffreyBrown about the show based on his own story.

urls.title: Mo Amer
urls.description: Listen to this episode from Good For You on Spotify. Stand-up comedian Mo Amer tells Whitney about fleeing war, asking his 4th grade teacher for a rubber, and why he hasn’t watched porn in years.  Mo’s critically acclaimed show MO is streaming now on Netflix along with his comedy specials THE VAGABOND and MOHAMMED IN TEXAS.See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

@TobeNwigwe @teresaru @realmoamer #PREVIEW @andrewdansby @HoustonChron https://t.co/nR47E9Oswn https://t.co/ZCZqRm6DUV

I'm not sure many people grasp how big a deal it is that @realmoamer is getting his own scripted comedy about a fictionalized version of his life as a Palestinian refugee, ON NETFLIX. 

This is a major moment for Palestinian representation, and it needs to be talked about. 🧵
Watch this new show by one of the funniest there is: @realmoamer !! https://t.co/R85eoyKJNI
Home is where the hustle is. Mo, starring @realmoamer, only on Netflix 8/24 https://t.co/THCLLNFpuo
Please put @realmoamer on @nbcsnl.

urls.title: Mo Amer: "There's never been a Palestinian family like this on TV before" | Esquire Middle East
urls.description: Seven years ago, Mo Amer wrote the opening scene to a TV series, folded it up, and put it in his back pocket. It was the story he knew he would always tell someday—the story of a Palestinian boy born in Kuwait who moved to Texas on the cusp of becoming a teenager, a place he wouldn’t feel was his home until he found himself on stage as a stand-up comedian in the years to come.. Mo Amer: "There's never been a Palestinian family like this on TV before". mo amer, mo amer interview, mo amer mohammed in texas, mo amer netflix, mo amer netflix series, mo amer netflix series 2022, mo amer series, mo amer the vagabond, palestine, palestinian series. Brief.

@DaveChappelle and @realmoamer   was funny tonight in Buffalo, Ny. All proceeds to the show is going to the victims families of the Tops shootings! 👏🏾

So glad to have seen @DaveChappelle at Shea’s tonight. I knew there was a reason why he came here last minute. To hear that he’s donating all the money from tonights’s show to the #Buffalo10 families was just amazing. To also hear that the families were in the audience made me 😭
TONIGHT: @SethMeyers welcomes Sam Rockwell, @BetoORourke and comedian @realmoamer! https://t.co/9AcSD0RFRP

Ever since hearing @realmoamer talk about what Hummus is and isn’t I have seen so many “hummus” recipes and all I can hear is his responses.

Avacado hummus!
That’s guacamole!

Sweet potato hummus!
That’s mashed potatoes!

Anyway, thanks Mo! That’s gonna be with me forever.

“Everybody is calling him different names like, ‘What's up, Rock?’ ‘What's up, D.J.?’ ‘Hey, Dwayne.’ And I walked up to him like, ‘Hey, man, what do I call you?’ He goes, ‘Daddy.’” – @realmoamer on acting with @TheRock in #BlackAdam https://t.co/Zol4pJwmVA
